title: Oregon Caves National Monument & Preserve: Indoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Indoor Activities              Indoor Activities                   Cave exhibit at Oregon Caves               Layers of life in the Siskiyou Mountains               Ice Age Jaguar Sculpture               Grizzly Bear Fossils         Â    Visitor Center Exhibit Stroll through the exhibit and learn more about the cave and how you can help protect the park's resources. Experience how the extraordinary Geo-complexity of the Siskiyou Mountains creates a dynamic range of biodiversity. Journey through geologic time and discover how the ground below is constantly shifting and moving. Watch animated videos of our changing planet, how the caves were formed, learn how a bat uses echolocation, uncover fossils and see what animals used to call Oregon Caves home, and so much more!
